distinct
from T_CHECK_RECORD_EXCEPTION
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CHECK_RECORD_EXCEPTION (EXCEPTION_SERIAL_NO, TRAD_SERIAL_NO, ORDER_AMT, VOUCHER_AMT, CLEAR_BASE_AMT, TRANS_CODE, PAY_STATUS, TRAD_TIME, THIRD_PLAT_FEE, CHANNEL_SERIAL_NO, CHANNEL_ORDER_AMT, CHANNEL_VOUCHER_AMT, CHANNEL_CLEAR_BASE_AMT, CHANNEL_TRANS_CODE, CHANNEL_PAY_STATUS, CHANNEL_TRAD_TIME, CHANNEL_FEE, CHECK_STATUS, EXCEPTION_INFO, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_SIMPLE_NAME, TERMINAL_CODE, TERMINAL_SERIAL_NO, THIRD_PLAT_CODE, PAY_TYPE, PAY_SCENE, BUYER_AUTH_CODE, PAY_ACCOUNT_NO, BANK_CARD_TYPE, GOODS_DESC, CURRENCY_CODE, EXCHANGE_RATE, FEE_RATE_CODE, CREATE_TIME, CHANNEL_NO, PROCESS_STATE) values (#{exceptionSerialNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradSerialNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voucherAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clearBaseAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{thirdPlatFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelOrderAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelVoucherAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelClearBaseAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelTransCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelPayStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channelTradTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{channelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{exceptionInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{branchSimpleName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{terminalCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{terminalSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdPlatCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payScene,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buyerAuthCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAccountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeRateCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{processState,jdbcType=CHAR})
